name: sqldef
description: Simple wasm wrapper around sqldef for easy use with web/node/bun/deno

scripts.build: cd go && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm tinygo build -target wasm -o sqldef.wasm sqldef-wasm.go && cp $(tinygo env TINYGOROOT)/targets/wasm_exec.js . && cd .. && node build.js

author: David Konsumer <konsumer@jetboystudio.com> (http://konsumer.js.org)
